body.p: A PowerHub 2 PDU can be placed on an optional floor stand that will support the main cabinet and the optional Side Car. The floor stand is available in several heights to match the height of your installation’s raised floor, ranging from 12" to 60". At time of order, select the floor stand that matches your raised floor height. Floor stands are height-adjustable ±1.5". (See and ).

To install the PDU on a floor stand:
Remove floor tiles and/or make floor tile cutouts to match the width and depth of the floor stand.
On adjustable floor stands, adjust the bottom height adjustment screws to adjust the floor stand height to match your raised floor height.
Place the floor stand within the raised floor opening and bolt securely to the subfloor.
Place PDU on the floor stand.
Attach PDU to floor stand. Floor stands have 0.625" x 1.00" slots for attaching PDU. Installer chooses and provides attachment hardware.
